## LightModel.calculateNormalWithTBN() method

Calculate pixel normal by given TBN matrix

**Signature:**

```typescript
calculateNormalWithTBN(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, texCoord: PBShaderExp, TBN: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | The shader scope |
|  texCoord | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  TBN | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | TBN matrix |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

Calculated pixel normal
